programme.desc: A talk show, wherein the panel members along with the audience, participate and engage in healthy discussions regarding issues that matter to the Korean society.

programme.title: School, Meet The Orchestra
programme.desc: Schools nationwide are buzzing with noise! Schools once known for academic stress and violence are now filled with the sound of instrumentsa; Who is responsible for all this? It's music!"A journey for the orchestra of hope begins with two musicians."Tune in to the documentary special, "School, Meet the Orchestra"."
